title: [MAJOR] The Most Shocking Conspiracy About Leblanc
body:
[Spoiler/Warning] This post is about to reveal the most terrible truth about Lux and Leblanc, so please read as your own risk.[Spoiler/Warning] 

*  I think I just discovered major secret about Leblanc, it's all started when I analyzed one of Leblanc's joke:

> {{champion:7}} : Lying is, like, ninety five percent (95%) of what I do.

* It sounds normal, right ? But if you use "Reverse Psychology" you'll know that she's technically lying now. Which means she's honest 95% of all the time, and only lying for 5%. Then....

> {{champion:7}} : For my next trick I'll make their life bar disappear.

* Again, if you use Reverse Psychology, she meant that her next trick will make your life bar full. Hence, she's a healer. Who's the strongest healer in the game ? The answer is {{champion:16}} . Oh wait! Let's take a close look at their weapons !

http://i.imgur.com/tJoB3Jo.png

* What did you notice ? They both use staff as a weapon. Not just that both staffs have similar shape (You know like a C shape, or waxing crescent moon). Coincident ? I guess not. Remember both champs used to have a single target silence that have no counter play; those were so toxic that Riot had to remove or rework 'em. 
* Mind blowing ? It's not over yet !

> {{champion:7}} : Looks can be deceiving.

* If you inspect this line in game, you'll hear something like "Lux can be deceiving". Leblanc is giving us a hint that Lux..... can be deceiving ?
* Okay it doesn't make any sense but if you take a look at {{champion:99}} 's Lore.

> In Lux's lord, Lux tricked Morgana to give Lux a demonstration of {{champion:25}} 's binding. Lux studied, mimic-ed Morgana's binding and made her own spell (Lux has "Spell Thief" in her skin line). 

* Damn Lux ! You're such cunning and.... !Deceiving! ? . Holy moly ! It all makes sense now. Lux mimic-ed Morgana's spell, who else can mimic spell ??? {{champion:7}} 's ultimate. So, Lux is Leblanc ? Let's take a look at Leblanc's splashart.

http://i.imgur.com/3luTqhm.jpg?1

* As you notice, Leblanc splash has 2 face expressions there. Real Leblanc looks innocence and worried, the Leblanc clone's face looks intriguing  like it's about to do something really Evil. So my assumption is that Lux is Leblanc's clone !!!! Alright, here are proofs.

> {{champion:99}}: Light mage? I'm just an ordinary mage.

How can you not be a Light mage ? You literally just shoot rainbow, light, even banish the shadow. Ofc, you're Leblanc's clone who is an ordinary mage (not Light mage). Well atleast Leblanc clone was being honest.  

* Here's another proof. When Lux dies, she'll disappear into thin light, why don't we see her body  ? Because she's not real, she's an illusion of Leblanc. Just like Leblanc's clone Lux disappear upon death.

* Let's get to the most important part ! We all know that in Leblanc, she likes to pretend to be Jarvan, the fourth. Dont you think it's a little bit  creepy and pointless ? My  conspiracy is that Leblanc wanted approach Lux and expose her when she's at least cautious.


_So the whole game was a lie ? Leblanc was the true hero who urge to fix her mistake? And Lux is Evil ? So is Lux even a champion ? if so what happened to the real Lux ? What has the clone done to her ? It'll be never unraveling.

{{champion:7}} : Tricky aren't you ?

* Can someone just explain this BS ?

TL;DD - Overall conspiracy:
*  Leblanc used to be a healer support.
*  Leblanc is heroic.
* Lux is Evil.
* Lux is Unreal.
* Leblanc isn't an awful person like most of use thought.
* {{champion:7}} : Looks can be deceiving.

I said it before and I'll say it again. {{champion:7}} got so fed she killed all the other champs, broke out of Summoners Rift, destroyed the League of legends and is now posing as every champ in the game to keep the citizens unaware. Don't be fooled people!
# The Cake is a lie
#  Soylent Green is people
# Leblanc is every champ

]Sdoᴉlǝɹ/Mɐɹuᴉuƃ[ ┴ɥᴉs dosʇ ᴉs ɐqonʇ ʇo ɹǝʌǝɐl ʇɥǝ ɯosʇ ʇǝɹɹᴉqlǝ ʇɹnʇɥ ɐqonʇ ˥nx ɐup ˥ǝqlɐuɔ' so dlǝɐsǝ ɹǝɐp ɐs ʎonɹ oʍu ɹᴉsʞ˙]Sdoᴉlǝɹ/Mɐɹuᴉuƃ[

I ʇɥᴉuʞ I ɾnsʇ pᴉsɔoʌǝɹǝp ɯɐɾoɹ sǝɔɹǝʇ ɐqonʇ ˥ǝqlɐuɔ' ᴉʇ,s ɐll sʇɐɹʇǝp ʍɥǝu I ɐuɐlʎzǝp ouǝ oɟ ˥ǝqlɐuɔ,s ɾoʞǝ:
<  : ˥ʎᴉuƃ ᴉs' lᴉʞǝ' uᴉuǝʇʎ ɟᴉʌǝ dǝɹɔǝuʇ )6ϛ%( oɟ ʍɥɐʇ I po˙

Iʇ sonups uoɹɯɐl' ɹᴉƃɥʇ ¿ qnʇ ᴉɟ ʎon nsǝ ,,ɹǝʌǝɹsǝ Ԁsʎɔɥoloƃʎ,, ʎon,ll ʞuoʍ ʇɥɐʇ sɥǝ,s ʇǝɔɥuᴉɔɐllʎ lʎᴉuƃ uoʍ˙ Mɥᴉɔɥ ɯǝɐus sɥǝ,s ɥouǝsʇ 6ϛ% oɟ ɐll ʇɥǝ ʇᴉɯǝ' ɐup oulʎ lʎᴉuƃ ɟoɹ ϛ%˙ ┴ɥǝu˙˙˙˙
<  : Ⅎoɹ ɯʎ uǝxʇ ʇɹᴉɔʞ I,ll ɯɐʞǝ ʇɥǝᴉɹ lᴉɟǝ qɐɹ pᴉsɐddǝɐɹ˙

∀ƃɐᴉu' ᴉɟ ʎon nsǝ ɹǝʌǝɹsǝ Ԁsʎɔɥoloƃʎ' sɥǝ ɯǝɐuʇ ʇɥɐʇ ɥǝɹ uǝxʇ ʇɹᴉɔʞ ʍᴉll ɯɐʞǝ ʎonɹ lᴉɟǝ qɐɹ ɟnll˙ Hǝuɔǝ' sɥǝ,s ɐ ɥǝɐlǝɹ˙ Mɥo,s ʇɥǝ sʇɹouƃǝsʇ ɥǝɐlǝɹ ᴉu ʇɥǝ ƃɐɯǝ ¿ ┴ɥǝ ɐusʍǝɹ ᴉs  ˙ Oɥ ʍɐᴉʇ¡ ˥ǝʇ,s ʇɐʞǝ ɐ ɔlosǝ looʞ ɐʇ ʇɥǝᴉɹ ʍǝɐdous ¡


Mɥɐʇ pᴉp ʎon uoʇᴉɔǝ ¿ ┴ɥǝʎ qoʇɥ nsǝ sʇɐɟɟ ɐs ɐ ʍǝɐdou˙ Noʇ ɾnsʇ ʇɥɐʇ qoʇɥ sʇɐɟɟs ɥɐʌǝ sᴉɯᴉlɐɹ sɥɐdǝ )⅄on ʞuoʍ lᴉʞǝ ɐ Ɔ sɥɐdǝ' oɹ ʍɐxᴉuƃ ɔɹǝsɔǝuʇ ɯoou(˙ Ɔoᴉuɔᴉpǝuʇ ¿ I ƃnǝss uoʇ˙ ɹǝɯǝɯqǝɹ qoʇɥ ɔɥɐɯds nsǝp ʇo ɥɐʌǝ ɐ sᴉuƃlǝ ʇɐɹƃǝʇ sᴉlǝuɔǝ ʇɥɐʇ ɥɐʌǝ uo ɔonuʇǝɹ dlɐʎ; ʇɥosǝ ʍǝɹǝ so ʇoxᴉɔ ʇɥɐʇ ɹᴉoʇ ɥɐp ʇo ɹǝɯoʌǝ oɹ ɹǝʍoɹʞ ,ǝɯ˙
Wᴉup qloʍᴉuƃ ¿ Iʇ,s uoʇ oʌǝɹ ʎǝʇ ¡
<  : ˥ooʞs ɔɐu qǝ pǝɔǝᴉʌᴉuƃ˙

Iɟ ʎon ᴉusdǝɔʇ ʇɥᴉs lᴉuǝ ᴉu ƃɐɯǝ' ʎon,ll ɥǝɐɹ soɯǝʇɥᴉuƃ lᴉʞǝ ,,˥nx ɔɐu qǝ pǝɔǝᴉʌᴉuƃ,,˙ ˥ǝqlɐuɔ ᴉs ƃᴉʌᴉuƃ ns ɐ ɥᴉuʇ ʇɥɐʇ ˥nx˙˙˙˙˙ ɔɐu qǝ pǝɔǝᴉʌᴉuƃ ¿
Oʞɐʎ ᴉʇ poǝsu,ʇ ɯɐʞǝ ɐuʎ sǝusǝ qnʇ ᴉɟ ʎon ʇɐʞǝ ɐ looʞ ɐʇ  ,s ˥oɹǝ˙
< Iu ˥nx,s loɹp' ˥nx ʇɹᴉɔʞǝp Woɹƃɐuɐ ʇo ƃᴉʌǝ ˥nx ɐ pǝɯousʇɹɐʇᴉou oɟ  ,s qᴉupᴉuƃ˙ ˥nx sʇnpᴉǝp' ɯᴉɯᴉɔ-ǝp Woɹƃɐuɐ,s qᴉupᴉuƃ ɐup ɯɐpǝ ɥǝɹ oʍu sdǝll )˥nx ɥɐs ,,Sdǝll ┴ɥᴉǝɟ,, ᴉu ɥǝɹ sʞᴉu lᴉuǝ(˙

pɐɯu ˥nx ¡ ⅄on,ɹǝ snɔɥ ɔnuuᴉuƃ ɐup˙˙˙˙ ¡pǝɔǝᴉʌᴉuƃ¡ ¿ ˙ Holʎ ɯolʎ ¡ Iʇ ɐll ɯɐʞǝs sǝusǝ uoʍ˙ ˥nx ɯᴉɯᴉɔ-ǝp Woɹƃɐuɐ,s sdǝll' ʍɥo ǝlsǝ ɔɐu ɯᴉɯᴉɔ sdǝll ¿¿¿  ,s nlʇᴉɯɐʇǝ˙ So' ˥nx ᴉs ˥ǝqlɐuɔ ¿ ˥ǝʇ,s ʇɐʞǝ ɐ looʞ ɐʇ ˥ǝqlɐuɔ,s sdlɐsɥɐɹʇ˙


∀s ʎon uoʇᴉɔǝ' ˥ǝqlɐuɔ sdlɐsɥ ɥɐs ᄅ ɟɐɔǝ ǝxdɹǝssᴉous ʇɥǝɹǝ˙ ɹǝɐl ˥ǝqlɐuɔ looʞs ᴉuuoɔǝuɔǝ ɐup ʍoɹɹᴉǝp' ʇɥǝ ˥ǝqlɐuɔ ɔlouǝ,s ɟɐɔǝ looʞs ᴉuʇɹᴉƃnᴉuƃ lᴉʞǝ ᴉʇ,s ɐqonʇ ʇo po soɯǝʇɥᴉuƃ ɹǝɐllʎ Ǝʌᴉl˙ So ɯʎ ɐssnɯdʇᴉou ᴉs ʇɥɐʇ ˥nx ᴉs ˥ǝqlɐuɔ,s ɔlouǝ ¡¡¡¡ ∀lɹᴉƃɥʇ' ɥǝɹǝ ɐɹǝ dɹooɟs˙
< : ˥ᴉƃɥʇ ɯɐƃǝ¿ I,ɯ ɾnsʇ ɐu oɹpᴉuɐɹʎ ɯɐƃǝ˙

Hoʍ ɔɐu ʎon uoʇ qǝ ɐ ˥ᴉƃɥʇ ɯɐƃǝ ¿ ⅄on lᴉʇǝɹɐllʎ ɾnsʇ sɥooʇ ɹɐᴉuqoʍ' lᴉƃɥʇ' ǝʌǝu qɐuᴉsɥ ʇɥǝ sɥɐpoʍ˙ Oɟɔ' ʎon,ɹǝ ˥ǝqlɐuɔ,s ɔlouǝ ʍɥo ᴉs ɐu oɹpᴉuɐɹʎ ɯɐƃǝ )uoʇ ˥ᴉƃɥʇ ɯɐƃǝ(˙ Mǝll ɐʇlǝɐsʇ ˥ǝqlɐuɔ ɔlouǝ ʍɐs qǝᴉuƃ ɥouǝsʇ˙

Hǝɹǝ,s ɐuoʇɥǝɹ dɹooɟ˙ Mɥǝu ˥nx pᴉǝs' sɥǝ,ll pᴉsɐddǝɐɹ ᴉuʇo ʇɥᴉu lᴉƃɥʇ' ʍɥʎ pou,ʇ ʍǝ sǝǝ ɥǝɹ qopʎ ¿ qǝɔɐnsǝ sɥǝ,s uoʇ ɹǝɐl' sɥǝ,s ɐu ᴉllnsᴉou oɟ ˥ǝqlɐuɔ˙ ſnsʇ lᴉʞǝ ˥ǝqlɐuɔ,s ɔlouǝ ˥nx pᴉsɐddǝɐɹ ndou pǝɐʇɥ˙

˥ǝʇ,s ƃǝʇ ʇo ʇɥǝ ɯosʇ ᴉɯdoɹʇɐuʇ dɐɹʇ ¡ Mǝ ɐll ʞuoʍ ʇɥɐʇ ᴉu ˥ǝqlɐuɔ' sɥǝ lᴉʞǝs ʇo dɹǝʇǝup ʇo qǝ ſɐɹʌɐu' ʇɥǝ ɟonɹʇɥ˙ pouʇ ʎon ʇɥᴉuʞ ᴉʇ,s ɐ lᴉʇʇlǝ qᴉʇ ɔɹǝǝdʎ ɐup doᴉuʇlǝss ¿ Wʎ ɔousdᴉɹɐɔʎ ᴉs ʇɥɐʇ ˥ǝqlɐuɔ ʍɐuʇǝp ɐddɹoɐɔɥ ˥nx ɐup ǝxdosǝ ɥǝɹ ʍɥǝu sɥǝ,s ɐʇ lǝɐsʇ ɔɐnʇᴉons˙

‾So ʇɥǝ ʍɥolǝ ƃɐɯǝ ʍɐs ɐ lᴉǝ ¿ ˥ǝqlɐuɔ ʍɐs ʇɥǝ ʇɹnǝ ɥǝɹo ʍɥo nɹƃǝ ʇo ɟᴉx ɥǝɹ ɯᴉsʇɐʞǝ¿ ∀up ˥nx ᴉs Ǝʌᴉl ¿ So ᴉs ˥nx ǝʌǝu ɐ ɔɥɐɯdᴉou ¿ ᴉɟ so ʍɥɐʇ ɥɐddǝuǝp ʇo ʇɥǝ ɹǝɐl ˥nx ¿ Mɥɐʇ ɥɐs ʇɥǝ ɔlouǝ pouǝ ʇo ɥǝɹ ¿ Iʇ,ll qǝ uǝʌǝɹ nuɹɐʌǝlᴉuƃ˙

 : ┴ɹᴉɔʞʎ ɐɹǝu,ʇ ʎon ¿

Ɔɐu soɯǝouǝ ɾnsʇ ǝxdlɐᴉu ʇɥᴉs qS ¿

˥ǝqlɐuɔ nsǝp ʇo qǝ ɐ ɥǝɐlǝɹ snddoɹʇ˙ ˥ǝqlɐuɔ ᴉs ɥǝɹoᴉɔ˙
˥nx ᴉs Ǝʌᴉl˙ ˥nx ᴉs ∩uɹǝɐl˙
˥ǝqlɐuɔ ᴉsu,ʇ ɐu ɐʍɟnl dǝɹsou lᴉʞǝ ɯosʇ oɟ nsǝ ʇɥonƃɥʇ˙  : ˥ooʞs ɔɐu qǝ pǝɔǝᴉʌᴉuƃ˙

Soɹɹʎ ɟoɹ louƃ dosʇ' ʇɥᴉs ᴉs ɐ פɹɐʌǝs,s sǝlɟᴉǝ ʍᴉʇɥ ɔᴉƃɐɹ˙ )Ɔɹǝpᴉʇ ʇo ɐɹʇᴉsʇ(

Not bad seems like a nice theory.  I just have a quip about who the clone is in Lebonk's splash as I think the real lebonk is the tricky on in the back and the fake is the one she put up front to fool everybody.
I completely follow, but that may be because I often play illusionists in table top RPGs.
FYI, Leblanc in game isn't real leblanc.
And who is she?
{{champion:17}}

Well, last time the lore was real, she was setting up the return of the Black Rose from her home. Swain was, with her for various points. In the mean time, her clones were:

masquerading as Jarvan 4, forcing Katarina to work with Garen to prevent a Demacian-Noxian War, whilte J4 was kidnapped or possibly dead.
A clone was also disguised as Swain so that Swain could embarrass someone challenging him for the highest post in Noxus. After this, the real Swain came back (unnoticed by the crowd), and he ordered Darius to execute the challenge.

LeBlanc herself has never appeared in the League's events(ie, you are playing as LeBlanc's clone in game), it is a cleverly made clone. The actual LeBlanc's last appearance is unknown.

It's easy to just consider her League's equivalent of Dr. Doom.

Okay first of all, all of these champions are too old to have such convoluted plot twists, it's mostly because of the design style of Riot back in the day.

Second, LeBlanc is not her real name. It's a Rank in her guild - the highest one apparently, passed down generations.

Her real name is Evaine, and i'm pretty sure she has some sort of a good nature inside of her but after all, she IS a noxian so strenght above all.

I do appreciate the extensive work you put into this theory. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
